title: Album View Hearting Sync & Session Handling
description: The album view now stays in sync with what you're doing in the player, and handles sign-in issues more gracefully.
changes: Hearting or unhearting tracks updates instantly, whether you do it in the player or in the album tracklist
The album view now matches the playlist view's behaviour for hearting
You'll be clearly notified if your Last.fm session expires, with a prompt to reconnect
The interface updates immediately and automatically corrects itself if something goes wrong

title: Playlist Playing Indicators
description: The playlists page now makes it much clearer what you're listening to at a glance.
changes: A speaker icon now appears on playlists that are currently playing
Playing playlists are highlighted directly on their cover images
Tabs also show a speaker icon when any playlist inside them is playing, even if the tab isn't active
This makes it easy to see what's playing without switching views or opening a playlist

title: Playlist Creation & Pipeline Configuration Improvements
description: This update refines how playlists are created and connected within the pipeline, reducing friction, removing legacy concepts, and making pipeline configuration clearer and more context-aware.
changes: Added a contextual "+ Add Playlist" action directly to the Playlists view, with the Add Playlist screen now receiving the active group and pre-filling it automatically
Playlists can now be created directly within the app as part of the add flow, removing the previous dependency on Playlist Management
Removed playlist creation from the Playlist Management page to eliminate duplication
Removed the Basic Information panel and manual Spotify Playlist ID entry â€” playlists are now retrieved by selecting them
Introduced Previous Stage configuration, allowing a playlist to explicitly declare which playlist feeds into it
Existing pipeline connections now display as read-only when already established, with direct links back to the source playlist
Pipeline dropdowns are now context-aware, only showing playlists that are valid and not already part of an existing connection

title: Mobile & Interface Improvements
changes: Improved mobile responsiveness across core views, including track lists, album grids, and player controls
Refined layouts and controls on smaller screens to reduce clutter and improve usability
Simplified playlist and album views, prioritising primary actions on mobile
Introduced a more consistent page layout and improved overall UI structure
Added a slide-out navigation menu for mobile devices
Improved readability and visual consistency across album items and buttons

title: Latest Movements Improvements
changes: Removed playlist links in friends' movements view - playlists are no longer clickable to prevent viewing friends' playlists
Added 'Exclude queued' toggle to Latest Movements to filter out albums in source/queued playlists
Added option to exclude individual playlists from movements feed in playlist settings

title: Friends Feature & Major Improvements
changes: Implemented Friends feature - connect and view friends' movements
Added profile picture selection from Last.fm and Spotify
Added RYM link customization
Optimized album processing to reduce Spotify API calls
Changed track selection to pick first track instead of last when playcounts are equal
Updated Spotify player name to Tunicious Web Player
Fixed cancel button on edit playlist page
Fixed flickering Spotify Connection issue banner

title: Last.fm Session Management Improvements
changes: Replaced Last.fm session expiration alert with a modal dialog
Added reconnect button to session expired modal for easy re-authentication
Users are now redirected back to their originating page after successful Last.fm reconnection
Created BaseModal component for consistent modal dialogs across the application
Added tertiary button variant (outline style) to design system
Updated disconnect confirmation modal to use new BaseModal component

title: Updates Page & Homepage Improvements
changes: Added updates page to inform users of changes
New last played panel added to homepage
Playcount iteration made global, so it accurately updates playcount on whatever page you're on
Redesigned movements card with improved layout, clickable playlist links, and pill-style type tags
